description:
StackloK’s founders say that security software designed to help with open source issues should also be open source. Stacklok, the security startup focused on securing…

The post Supply Chain Focused Startup, Stacklok, Donates Minder Platform to OpenSSF appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Supply Chain Focused Startup, Stacklok, Donates Minder Platform to OpenSSF

description:
Today at All Things Open, Open Source Initiative announced the release of the Open Source AI Definition, possibly paving the way for open source AI licensing.

The post OSI’s Open Source AI Definition 1.0 Unveiled at All Things Open appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: OSI’s Open Source AI Definition 1.0 Unveiled at All Things Open
